name: Good Ol' Space Boiz (And A Panda)
name_original: Good Ol' Space Boiz (And A Panda)
description:
Hi there!
NOW THIS IS REAL POD RACING!!!!

In 9 hours after our first project for this game jam, we decided to SHOW THE WORLD WHAT REAL POD RACING IS LIKE! This is a VR game where you pilot an amazing pod racer through a boxed canyon in the middle of space reason.

Credits:

Eric W. Rogers

-Tomas Abrams

Melisa Johnson
